extension.name: asha-s-inline
extension.author: Bram Waasdorp
extension.description: Asha-s template ontwikkeld voor detailpaginas website Asha-s.com met veel opties om de lay-out vanuit het CMS aan te passen artikelen als inline blokjes vooral voor foto's en video

field.name: explanation
field.label: With these variables you can change the lay-out (of the style) of the template a little bit.

field.name: gplusProfile
field.label: G+Profile
field.description: Google+ profile

field.name: breakpointMobile
field.label: Breakpoint Mobile:
field.description: Breakpoint body width seen as mobile

field.name: hlMarginTop
field.label: Margin top headerleft block:
field.description: Margin top headerleft block as percentage

field.name: hlMarginLeft
field.label: Margin left headerleft block:
field.description: Margin left headerleft block as percentage

field.name: hlWidth
field.label: Width headerleft block:
field.description: Width headerleft block as percentage, 100 = full screen

field.name: hlHeight
field.label: Heigh headerleft block:
field.description: Height headerleft block as percentage, 100 = full screen

field.name: hlMarginBottom
field.label: Margin bottom headerleft block:
field.description: Margin bottom headerleft block as percentage

field.name: showTitle
field.label: Show title
field.description: Show the title of the item

field.name: phMarginTop
field.label: Margin top title:
field.description: Margin top title as percentage

field.name: phWidth
field.label: Width title:
field.description: Width title as percentage.

field.name: background
field.label: Background:
field.description: Background colors an character colors etc.

field.name: bgColor
field.label: Background color:
field.description: If not empty overwrite background color of Background . #RGB, #000000 = black, #FF0000 = red, #00FF00 = green, #0000FF = blue, #FFFFFF = white, default #080810

field.name: fgColor
field.label: Foreground color:
field.description: If not empty overwrite color of most texts . #RGB, #000000 = black, #FF0000 = red, #00FF00 = green, #0000FF = blue, #FFFFFF = white, default #080810

field.name: logo
field.label: Logo image:
field.description: Select a logo image for the right upper corner

field.name: logoWidth
field.label: Width logo:
field.description: Width logo as percentage of pagewidth

field.name: logoPosLeft
field.label: Left margin logo:
field.description: Position left margin logo as percentage of width 0 = left edge, 100 = right edge

field.name: logoPosTop
field.label: Top margin logo:
field.description: Position top logo as percentage of height, 0 = top, 100 = (under) bottom

field.name: iconsWidth
field.label: Width icons:
field.description: Width icons social media as percentage of pagewidth

field.name: iconsPosLeft
field.label: Left margin icons:
field.description: Position left margin icons as percentage of width 0 = left edge, 100 = right edge

field.name: iconsPosTop
field.label: Top margin icons:
field.description: Position top icons as percentage of height, 0 = top, 100 = (under) bottom

field.name: contentPosTop
field.label: Top margin content:
field.description: Position top margin content

field.name: contentPosLeft
field.label: Left margin main content:
field.description: Width left content or position left margin main content as percentage 0 = left edge, 100 = right edge

field.name: contentPosRight
field.label: Right margin main content:
field.description: Width right margin main content as percentage 0 = right edge, 100 = left edge

field.name: marginLeftRight
field.label: Margins left and right:
field.description: Margins left and right as percentage

field.name: itemPageWidth
field.label: Width single article:
field.description: Width single article as percentage

field.name: itemLeadHeight
field.label: Row height leading:
field.description: Row height leading articles.

field.name: itemLeadWidth
field.label: Article width leading:
field.description: Width leading article.

field.name: itemLeadMargin
field.label: Margin leading:
field.description: Margin leading articles.

field.name: itemHeight
field.label: Row height:
field.description: Row height articles.

field.name: itemWidth
field.label: Article width:
field.description: Width article.

field.name: itemMargin
field.label: Margin:
field.description: Margin between articles.

field.name: explanation2
field.label:
Color links and menuoptions #RGB or colorname. #RGB: #000000 = black, #FF0000 = red, #00FF00 = lime, #0000FF = blue, #FFFFFF = white.
Names: yellow, fuchsia, red, aqua, lime, blue, olive, purple, maroon, teal, green, navy, white, black, gray, silver.

field.name: linkColor
field.label: Link color:
field.description: If not empty overwrite color of links.

field.name: linkDecoration
field.label: Underline link
field.description: Underline link.

field.name: linkHvColor
field.label: Link hover color:
field.description: If not empty overwrite color of link where mouse hovers above.

field.name: menuMarginTop
field.label: Margin top menu:
field.description: Margin top menu as percentage.

field.name: menuMarginLeft
field.label: Margin left menu:
field.description: Margin left menu as percentage.

field.name: menuColor
field.label: Menutext color:
field.description: If not empty overwrite color of menu text.

field.name: menuFontSize
field.label: Menu text size:
field.description: Menu text font size (pixels).

field.name: menuDisplay
field.label: Horizontal menu
field.description: Underline menu text.

field.name: menuDecoration
field.label: Underline menu text
field.description: Underline menu text.

field.name: menuHvColor

field.description: If not empty overwrite color of menu text where mouse hovers above .

field.name: menuHvDecoration
field.label: Underline hovered menu
field.description: Underline menu text where mouse hovers above.

field.name: menuActiveColor
field.label: Active menu color:
field.description: If not empty overwrite text color of active menu.

field.name: menuActiveDecoration
field.label: Underline active menu item
field.description: Underline menu text of active menu item.

field.name: footerWidth
field.label: Width footers:
field.description: Width footer as percentage of pagewidth

field.name: footerPosLeft
field.label: Left margin footer:
field.description: Position left margin footer as percentage of width 0 = left edge, 100 = right edge

field.name: footerPosBottom
field.label: Bottom margin footer:
field.description: Position bottom footer as percentage of height, 0 = bottom
